item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.

item.title: South African universities trail other BRICS
item.dc:creator: admin
item.excerpt:encoded: South Africa has eight of the top 15 universities in Africa but its higher learning institutions are rated as the worst performing among the BRICS emerging market nations.

If determined, students can complete an online diploma program while continuing to work, care for loved ones or fulfill other commitments. Online diploma programs are highly practical, allowing students to study a specific area, with a thorough overview of the field.
Associate degrees usually take approximately two years when studying full time and are available at community colleges and technical schools around the world
Summer courses are a great way to gain qualifications and academic credits in a convenient format. Offered during the summer months while some working professionals and students are taking a break, online summer courses fit nicely into a busy schedule. The web-based study format opens doors to studying at a university that is geographically distant, or at times that are most convenient for each individual student.","editor":"Online diplomas are awarded for one to two years of study at a community college, technical school or university. item.excerpt:encoded: After years of watching Vancouver housing prices climb, driven in part by Chinese investment, Eveline Xia came to a painful realization: Despite having a Master`s degree and solid career prospects.

If determined, students can complete an online diploma program while continuing to work, care for loved ones or fulfill other commitments. Online diploma programs are highly practical, allowing students to study a specific area, with a thorough overview of the field.
Associate degrees usually take approximately two years when studying full time and are available at community colleges and technical schools around the world
Summer courses are a great way to gain qualifications and academic credits in a convenient format. Offered during the summer months while some working professionals and students are taking a break, online summer courses fit nicely into a busy schedule. The web-based study format opens doors to studying at a university that is geographically distant, or at times that are most convenient for each individual student.","editor":"Online diplomas are awarded for one to two years of study at a community college, technical school or university. If determined, students can complete an online diploma program while continuing to work, care for loved ones or fulfill other commitments. Online diploma programs are highly practical, allowing students to study a specific area, with a thorough overview of the field.
Associate degrees usually take approximately two years when studying full time and are available at community colleges and technical schools around the world
Summer courses are a great way to gain qualifications and academic credits in a convenient format. Offered during the summer months while some working professionals and students are taking a break, online summer courses fit nicely into a busy schedule. The web-based study format opens doors to studying at a university that is geographically distant, or at times that are most convenient for each individual student.","editor":"Online diplomas are awarded for one to two years of study at a community college, technical school or university. item.title: New Chicago school budget relies on state pension
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
New Chicago school budget relies on state pension

  • June 3, 2015

item.title: Show Your Passion with Theatre courses
item.dc:creator: admin
item.excerpt:encoded: With no prior experience, you will have the opportunity to walk through hands-on examples with Hadoop and Spark frameworks, two of the most common in the industry. You will be comfortable explaining the specific components and basic processes of the Hadoop architecture, software stack, and execution environment. In the assignments you will be guided in how data scientists apply the important concepts and techniques such as Map-Reduce that are used to solve fundamental problems in big data. You`ll feel empowered to have conversations about big data and the data analysis process.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
Productivity Hacks to Get More Done in 2018

28 February 2017

  1. Facebook News Feed Eradicator (free chrome extension) Stay focused by removing your Facebook newsfeed and replacing it with an inspirational quote. Disable the tool anytime you want to see what friends are up to!
  2. Hide My Inbox (free chrome extension for Gmail) Stay focused by hiding your inbox. Click "show your inbox" at a scheduled time and batch processs everything one go.
  3. Habitica (free mobile + web app) Gamify your to do list. Treat your life like a game and earn gold goins for getting stuff done!

[{"origin":"vc_row","id":"29757a3","elType":"section","settings":[],"elements":[{"origin":"vc_column","id":"2975bf5","elType":"column","settings":{"_inline_size_tablet":100,"_inline_size":100,"_column_size":100},"elements":[{"origin":"vc_column_text","id":"2975f21","elType":"widget","settings":{"content":"The primary goal of this quick start guide is to introduce you to Unreal Engine 4`s (UE4) development environment. By the end of this guide, you`ll know how to set up and develop C++ Projects in UE4. This guide shows you how to create a new Unreal Engine project, add a new C++ class to it, compile the project, and add an instance of a new class to your level. By the time you reach the end of this guide, you`ll be able to see your programmed Actor floating above a table in the level. This quick start guide shows you how to add assets to your Unreal Engine (UE4) games. By the end of this guide, you`ll know how to use the Project Browser to create new projects and navigate the Content Browser to find and add content. You`ll also know where to find information on the FBX Content Pipeline while learning how to use the Material Editor to modify Materials before applying them to a Static Mesh Actor.

Main Features

","editor":"The primary goal of this quick start guide is to introduce you to Unreal Engine 4`s (UE4) development environment. By the end of this guide, you`ll know how to set up and develop C++ Projects in UE4. This guide shows you how to create a new Unreal Engine project, add a new C++ class to it, compile the project, and add an instance of a new class to your level. By the time you reach the end of this guide, you`ll be able to see your programmed Actor floating above a table in the level. This quick start guide shows you how to add assets to your Unreal Engine (UE4) games. By the end of this guide, you`ll know how to use the Project Browser to create new projects and navigate the Content Browser to find and add content. You`ll also know where to find information on the FBX Content Pipeline while learning how to use the Material Editor to modify Materials before applying them to a Static Mesh Actor.

Main Features

"},"widgetType":"text-editor","elements":null},{"origin":"vc_column_text","id":"2977107","elType":"widget","settings":{"content":"
  • You might be thinking, all of the above - and that is fine. But as a complete beginner learning Unreal Engine 4.
  • The rendering system in Unreal Engine 4 is an all-new, DirectX 11 pipeline that includes deferred shading.
Learning a new game engine as a complete beginner is very intimidating. There are a lot of tutorials, documentation and advice already out but how do you start and proceed with learning Unreal Engine 4 is unclear. You get pulled into many different directions and end up confused and overwhelmed. I have spent a lot of time deconstructing what it takes to learn a game engine from scratch. What it is that you should focus on first and what you should avoid until later.","editor":"
  • You might be thinking, all of the above - and that is fine. But as a complete beginner learning Unreal Engine 4.
  • The rendering system in Unreal Engine 4 is an all-new, DirectX 11 pipeline that includes deferred shading.
Learning a new game engine as a complete beginner is very intimidating. There are a lot of tutorials, documentation and advice already out but how do you start and proceed with learning Unreal Engine 4 is unclear. You get pulled into many different directions and end up confused and overwhelmed. I have spent a lot of time deconstructing what it takes to learn a game engine from scratch. What it is that you should focus on first and what you should avoid until later."},"widgetType":"text-editor","elements":null}]}],"widgetType":"section"}]

Productivity Hacks to Get More Done in 2018

28 February 2017

  1. Facebook News Feed Eradicator (free chrome extension) Stay focused by removing your Facebook newsfeed and replacing it with an inspirational quote. Disable the tool anytime you want to see what friends are up to!
  2. Hide My Inbox (free chrome extension for Gmail) Stay focused by hiding your inbox. Click "show your inbox" at a scheduled time and batch processs everything one go.
  3. Habitica (free mobile + web app) Gamify your to do list. Treat your life like a game and earn gold goins for getting stuff done!

[{"origin":"vc_row","id":"282cc5c","elType":"section","settings":[],"elements":[{"origin":"vc_column","id":"282d0aa","elType":"column","settings":{"_inline_size_tablet":100,"_inline_size":100,"_column_size":100},"elements":[{"origin":"vc_column_text","id":"282d409","elType":"widget","settings":{"content":"The primary goal of this quick start guide is to introduce you to Unreal Engine 4`s (UE4) development environment. By the end of this guide, you`ll know how to set up and develop C++ Projects in UE4. This guide shows you how to create a new Unreal Engine project, add a new C++ class to it, compile the project, and add an instance of a new class to your level. By the time you reach the end of this guide, you`ll be able to see your programmed Actor floating above a table in the level. This quick start guide shows you how to add assets to your Unreal Engine (UE4) games. By the end of this guide, you`ll know how to use the Project Browser to create new projects and navigate the Content Browser to find and add content. You`ll also know where to find information on the FBX Content Pipeline while learning how to use the Material Editor to modify Materials before applying them to a Static Mesh Actor.

Main Features

  • You might be thinking, all of the above - and that is fine. But as a complete beginner learning Unreal Engine 4.
  • The rendering system in Unreal Engine 4 is an all-new, DirectX 11 pipeline that includes deferred shading.
Learning a new game engine as a complete beginner is very intimidating. There are a lot of tutorials, documentation and advice already out but how do you start and proceed with learning Unreal Engine 4 is unclear. You get pulled into many different directions and end up confused and overwhelmed. I have spent a lot of time deconstructing what it takes to learn a game engine from scratch. What it is that you should focus on first and what you should avoid until later.","editor":"
  • You might be thinking, all of the above - and that is fine. But as a complete beginner learning Unreal Engine 4.
  • The rendering system in Unreal Engine 4 is an all-new, DirectX 11 pipeline that includes deferred shading.
Learning a new game engine as a complete beginner is very intimidating. There are a lot of tutorials, documentation and advice already out but how do you start and proceed with learning Unreal Engine 4 is unclear. You get pulled into many different directions and end up confused and overwhelmed. I have spent a lot of time deconstructing what it takes to learn a game engine from scratch. What it is that you should focus on first and what you should avoid until later."},"widgetType":"text-editor","elements":null}]}],"widgetType":"section"}]

item.title: Make woman/men Clothes for Future
item.dc:creator: admin
item.excerpt:encoded: With no prior experience, you will have the opportunity to walk through hands-on examples with Hadoop and Spark frameworks, two of the most common in the industry. You will be comfortable explaining the specific components and basic processes of the Hadoop architecture, software stack, and execution environment. In the assignments you will be guided in how data scientists apply the important concepts and techniques such as Map-Reduce that are used to solve fundamental problems in big data. You`ll feel empowered to have conversations about big data and the data analysis process.

  • You might be thinking, all of the above - and that is fine. But as a complete beginner learning Unreal Engine 4.
  • The rendering system in Unreal Engine 4 is an all-new, DirectX 11 pipeline that includes deferred shading.
Learning a new game engine as a complete beginner is very intimidating. There are a lot of tutorials, documentation and advice already out but how do you start and proceed with learning Unreal Engine 4 is unclear. You get pulled into many different directions and end up confused and overwhelmed. I have spent a lot of time deconstructing what it takes to learn a game engine from scratch. What it is that you should focus on first and what you should avoid until later."},"widgetType":"text-editor","elements":null}]}],"widgetType":"section"}]

item.excerpt:encoded: With no prior experience, you will have the opportunity to walk through hands-on examples with Hadoop and Spark frameworks, two of the most common in the industry. You will be comfortable explaining the specific components and basic processes of the Hadoop architecture, software stack, and execution environment. In the assignments you will be guided in how data scientists apply the important concepts and techniques such as Map-Reduce that are used to solve fundamental problems in big data. You`ll feel empowered to have conversations about big data and the data analysis process.

[{"origin":"vc_row","id":"22c8c34","elType":"section","settings":[],"elements":[{"origin":"vc_column","id":"22c909a","elType":"column","settings":{"_inline_size_tablet":100,"_inline_size":100,"_column_size":100},"elements":[{"origin":"vc_column_text","id":"22c93c7","elType":"widget","settings":{"content":"The primary goal of this quick start guide is to introduce you to Unreal Engine 4`s (UE4) development environment. By the end of this guide, you`ll know how to set up and develop C++ Projects in UE4. This guide shows you how to create a new Unreal Engine project, add a new C++ class to it, compile the project, and add an instance of a new class to your level. By the time you reach the end of this guide, you`ll be able to see your programmed Actor floating above a table in the level. This quick start guide shows you how to add assets to your Unreal Engine (UE4) games. By the end of this guide, you`ll know how to use the Project Browser to create new projects and navigate the Content Browser to find and add content. You`ll also know where to find information on the FBX Content Pipeline while learning how to use the Material Editor to modify Materials before applying them to a Static Mesh Actor.

Main Features

By the end of this guide, you`ll know how to set up and develop C++ Projects in UE4. This guide shows you how to create a new Unreal Engine project, add a new C++ class to it, compile the project, and add an instance of a new class to your level. By the time you reach the end of this guide, you`ll be able to see your programmed Actor floating above a table in the level. This quick start guide shows you how to add assets to your Unreal Engine (UE4) games. By the end of this guide, you`ll know how to use the Project Browser to create new projects and navigate the Content Browser to find and add content. You`ll also know where to find information on the FBX Content Pipeline while learning how to use the Material Editor to modify Materials before applying them to a Static Mesh Actor.

Main Features

"},"widgetType":"text-editor","elements":null},{"origin":"vc_column_text","id":"1ed5b3b","elType":"widget","settings":{"content":"
  • You might be thinking, all of the above - and that is fine. But as a complete beginner learning Unreal Engine 4.
  • The rendering system in Unreal Engine 4 is an all-new, DirectX 11 pipeline that includes deferred shading.
Learning a new game engine as a complete beginner is very intimidating. There are a lot of tutorials, documentation and advice already out but how do you start and proceed with learning Unreal Engine 4 is unclear. You get pulled into many different directions and end up confused and overwhelmed. I have spent a lot of time deconstructing what it takes to learn a game engine from scratch. What it is that you should focus on first and what you should avoid until later.","editor":"

There are a lot of tutorials, documentation and advice already out but how do you start and proceed with learning Unreal Engine 4 is unclear. You get pulled into many different directions and end up confused and overwhelmed. I have spent a lot of time deconstructing what it takes to learn a game engine from scratch. What it is that you should focus on first and what you should avoid until later."},"widgetType":"text-editor","elements":null}]}],"widgetType":"section"}]

item.excerpt:encoded: With no prior experience, you will have the opportunity to walk through hands-on examples with Hadoop and Spark frameworks, two of the most common in the industry. You will be comfortable explaining the specific components and basic processes of the Hadoop architecture, software stack, and execution environment. In the assignments you will be guided in how data scientists apply the important concepts and techniques such as Map-Reduce that are used to solve fundamental problems in big data. You`ll feel empowered to have conversations about big data and the data analysis process.

  2. Hide My Inbox (free chrome extension for Gmail) Stay focused by hiding your inbox. Click "show your inbox" at a scheduled time and batch processs everything one go.
  3. Habitica (free mobile + web app) Gamify your to do list. Treat your life like a game and earn gold goins for getting stuff done!

[{"origin":"vc_row","id":"197443e","elType":"section","settings":[],"elements":[{"origin":"vc_column","id":"1974883","elType":"column","settings":{"_inline_size_tablet":100,"_inline_size":100,"_column_size":100},"elements":[{"origin":"vc_column_text","id":"1974bb2","elType":"widget","settings":{"content":"The primary goal of this quick start guide is to introduce you to Unreal Engine 4`s (UE4) development environment. By the end of this guide, you`ll know how to set up and develop C++ Projects in UE4. This guide shows you how to create a new Unreal Engine project, add a new C++ class to it, compile the project, and add an instance of a new class to your level. By the time you reach the end of this guide, you`ll be able to see your programmed Actor floating above a table in the level. This quick start guide shows you how to add assets to your Unreal Engine (UE4) games. By the end of this guide, you`ll know how to use the Project Browser to create new projects and navigate the Content Browser to find and add content. You`ll also know where to find information on the FBX Content Pipeline while learning how to use the Material Editor to modify Materials before applying them to a Static Mesh Actor.

Main Features

What is the target audience?

","editor":"

What is the target audience?

"},"widgetType":"text-editor","elements":null},{"origin":"vc_column_text","id":"1975cad","elType":"widget","settings":{"content":"
  • You might be thinking, all of the above - and that is fine. But as a complete beginner learning Unreal Engine 4.
  • The rendering system in Unreal Engine 4 is an all-new, DirectX 11 pipeline that includes deferred shading.
Learning a new game engine as a complete beginner is very intimidating. There are a lot of tutorials, documentation and advice already out but how do you start and proceed with learning Unreal Engine 4 is unclear. You get pulled into many different directions and end up confused and overwhelmed. I have spent a lot of time deconstructing what it takes to learn a game engine from scratch. What it is that you should focus on first and what you should avoid until later.","editor":"
  • You might be thinking, all of the above - and that is fine. But as a complete beginner learning Unreal Engine 4.
  • The rendering system in Unreal Engine 4 is an all-new, DirectX 11 pipeline that includes deferred shading.
Learning a new game engine as a complete beginner is very intimidating. There are a lot of tutorials, documentation and advice already out but how do you start and proceed with learning Unreal Engine 4 is unclear. You get pulled into many different directions and end up confused and overwhelmed. I have spent a lot of time deconstructing what it takes to learn a game engine from scratch. What it is that you should focus on first and what you should avoid until later."},"widgetType":"text-editor","elements":null}]}],"widgetType":"section"}]

item.title: Weight Training Courses with Any Di
item.dc:creator: admin
item.excerpt:encoded: With no prior experience, you will have the opportunity to walk through hands-on examples with Hadoop and Spark frameworks, two of the most common in the industry. You will be comfortable explaining the specific components and basic processes of the Hadoop architecture, software stack, and execution environment. In the assignments you will be guided in how data scientists apply the important concepts and techniques such as Map-Reduce that are used to solve fundamental problems in big data. You`ll feel empowered to have conversations about big data and the data analysis process.

Learning a new game engine as a complete beginner is very intimidating. There are a lot of tutorials, documentation and advice already out but how do you start and proceed with learning Unreal Engine 4 is unclear. You get pulled into many different directions and end up confused and overwhelmed. I have spent a lot of time deconstructing what it takes to learn a game engine from scratch. item.title: Design Instruments to Communicate with People
item.dc:creator: admin
item.excerpt:encoded: With no prior experience, you will have the opportunity to walk through hands-on examples with Hadoop and Spark frameworks, two of the most common in the industry. You will be comfortable explaining the specific components and basic processes of the Hadoop architecture, software stack, and execution environment. In the assignments you will be guided in how data scientists apply the important concepts and techniques such as Map-Reduce that are used to solve fundamental problems in big data. You'll feel empowered to have conversations about big data and the data analysis process.

  • You might be thinking, all of the above - and that is fine. But as a complete beginner learning Unreal Engine 4.
  • The rendering system in Unreal Engine 4 is an all-new, DirectX 11 pipeline that includes deferred shading.
Learning a new game engine as a complete beginner is very intimidating. There are a lot of tutorials, documentation and advice already out but how do you start and proceed with learning Unreal Engine 4 is unclear. You get pulled into many different directions and end up confused and overwhelmed. I have spent a lot of time deconstructing what it takes to learn a game engine from scratch. What it is that you should focus on first and what you should avoid until later.","editor":"
  • You might be thinking, all of the above - and that is fine. But as a complete beginner learning Unreal Engine 4.
  • The rendering system in Unreal Engine 4 is an all-new, DirectX 11 pipeline that includes deferred shading.
Learning a new game engine as a complete beginner is very intimidating. There are a lot of tutorials, documentation and advice already out but how do you start and proceed with learning Unreal Engine 4 is unclear. You get pulled into many different directions and end up confused and overwhelmed. I have spent a lot of time deconstructing what it takes to learn a game engine from scratch. What it is that you should focus on first and what you should avoid until later."},"widgetType":"text-editor","elements":null}]}],"widgetType":"section"}]

item.title: Correct and Beautiful Design Interaction
item.dc:creator: admin
item.excerpt:encoded: With no prior experience, you will have the opportunity to walk through hands-on examples with Hadoop and Spark frameworks, two of the most common in the industry. You will be comfortable explaining the specific components and basic processes of the Hadoop architecture, software stack, and execution environment. In the assignments you will be guided in how data scientists apply the important concepts and techniques such as Map-Reduce that are used to solve fundamental problems in big data. You`ll feel empowered to have conversations about big data and the data analysis process.

[{"origin":"vc_row","id":"13d070d","elType":"section","settings":[],"elements":[{"origin":"vc_column","id":"13d0c66","elType":"column","settings":{"_inline_size_tablet":100,"_inline_size":100,"_column_size":100},"elements":[{"origin":"vc_column_text","id":"13d0ff1","elType":"widget","settings":{"content":"The primary goal of this quick start guide is to introduce you to Unreal Engine 4`s (UE4) development environment. By the end of this guide, you`ll know how to set up and develop C++ Projects in UE4. This guide shows you how to create a new Unreal Engine project, add a new C++ class to it, compile the project, and add an instance of a new class to your level. By the time you reach the end of this guide, you`ll be able to see your programmed Actor floating above a table in the level. This quick start guide shows you how to add assets to your Unreal Engine (UE4) games. By the end of this guide, you`ll know how to use the Project Browser to create new projects and navigate the Content Browser to find and add content. You`ll also know where to find information on the FBX Content Pipeline while learning how to use the Material Editor to modify Materials before applying them to a Static Mesh Actor.

Main Features

item.title: Nvidia New Technologies Slides
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Two fourth grade classes are learning about the California Gold Rush and the migration that ensued. In one class, the teacher has difficulty maintaining students interest, and there is much chatter and note passing. In the other class, students are out of their seats, actively engaged, and retaining information (as witnessed on test scores)
Name of: View Number Visualization Natural
Individualization: 2345 275478 507475
Integral Components: 83835 754754 94757575
Demonstration: 2378 754278 507575
Significance: 2788 879699 947575
Description: 9769 960548 50879

Lesson planning is one of the most critical aspects of teaching as it handles both aspects of teaching, instruction and management

Lesson management refers to the planning and consideration that goes into the creation of an activity. It is an important aspect of maintaining management. The more children are engaged and interested in a lesson, the less likely they are to misbehave. A good lesson is comprised of five parts: clear objectives, teacher clarity, withitness/ overlapping, lesson momentum, lesson smoothness (including connected discourse and creative repetition), and maintaining group focus. (These will be discussed in greater detail below.) .

item.title: Learning Jazz like in San Francisco

item.excerpt:encoded: With no prior experience, you will have the opportunity to walk through hands-on examples with Hadoop and Spark frameworks, two of the most common in the industry. You will be comfortable explaining the specific components and basic processes of the Hadoop architecture, software stack, and execution environment. In the assignments you will be guided in how data scientists apply the important concepts and techniques such as Map-Reduce that are used to solve fundamental problems in big data. You`ll feel empowered to have conversations about big data and the data analysis process.

By the end of this guide, you`ll know how to set up and develop C++ Projects in UE4. This guide shows you how to create a new Unreal Engine project, add a new C++ class to it, compile the project, and add an instance of a new class to your level. By the time you reach the end of this guide, you`ll be able to see your programmed Actor floating above a table in the level. This quick start guide shows you how to add assets to your Unreal Engine (UE4) games. By the end of this guide, you`ll know how to use the Project Browser to create new projects and navigate the Content Browser to find and add content. You`ll also know where to find information on the FBX Content Pipeline while learning how to use the Material Editor to modify Materials before applying them to a Static Mesh Actor.

Main Features

  • You might be thinking, all of the above - and that is fine. But as a complete beginner learning Unreal Engine 4.
  • The rendering system in Unreal Engine 4 is an all-new, DirectX 11 pipeline that includes deferred shading.
Learning a new game engine as a complete beginner is very intimidating. There are a lot of tutorials, documentation and advice already out but how do you start and proceed with learning Unreal Engine 4 is unclear. You get pulled into many different directions and end up confused and overwhelmed. I have spent a lot of time deconstructing what it takes to learn a game engine from scratch. What it is that you should focus on first and what you should avoid until later.","editor":"
  • You might be thinking, all of the above - and that is fine. But as a complete beginner learning Unreal Engine 4.
  • The rendering system in Unreal Engine 4 is an all-new, DirectX 11 pipeline that includes deferred shading.
Learning a new game engine as a complete beginner is very intimidating. There are a lot of tutorials, documentation and advice already out but how do you start and proceed with learning Unreal Engine 4 is unclear. You get pulled into many different directions and end up confused and overwhelmed. I have spent a lot of time deconstructing what it takes to learn a game engine from scratch. What it is that you should focus on first and what you should avoid until later."},"widgetType":"text-editor","elements":null}]}],"widgetType":"section"}]

What is the target audience?

"},"widgetType":"text-editor","elements":null},{"origin":"vc_column_text","id":"094c811","elType":"widget","settings":{"content":"
  • You might be thinking, all of the above - and that is fine. But as a complete beginner learning Unreal Engine 4.
  • The rendering system in Unreal Engine 4 is an all-new, DirectX 11 pipeline that includes deferred shading.
Learning a new game engine as a complete beginner is very intimidating. There are a lot of tutorials, documentation and advice already out but how do you start and proceed with learning Unreal Engine 4 is unclear. You get pulled into many different directions and end up confused and overwhelmed. I have spent a lot of time deconstructing what it takes to learn a game engine from scratch. What it is that you should focus on first and what you should avoid until later.","editor":"
  • You might be thinking, all of the above - and that is fine. But as a complete beginner learning Unreal Engine 4.
  • The rendering system in Unreal Engine 4 is an all-new, DirectX 11 pipeline that includes deferred shading.
Learning a new game engine as a complete beginner is very intimidating. There are a lot of tutorials, documentation and advice already out but how do you start and proceed with learning Unreal Engine 4 is unclear. You get pulled into many different directions and end up confused and overwhelmed. I have spent a lot of time deconstructing what it takes to learn a game engine from scratch. What it is that you should focus on first and what you should avoid until later."},"widgetType":"text-editor","elements":null}]}],"widgetType":"section"}]

item.title: Console Development Basics with Unity
item.dc:creator: admin
item.excerpt:encoded: With no prior experience, you will have the opportunity to walk through hands-on examples with Hadoop and Spark frameworks, two of the most common in the industry. You will be comfortable explaining the specific components and basic processes of the Hadoop architecture, software stack, and execution environment. In the assignments you will be guided in how data scientists apply the important concepts and techniques such as Map-Reduce that are used to solve fundamental problems in big data. You`ll feel empowered to have conversations about big data and the data analysis process.

[{"origin":"vc_row","id":"0ad9348","elType":"section","settings":[],"elements":[{"origin":"vc_column","id":"0ad987f","elType":"column","settings":{"_inline_size_tablet":100,"_inline_size":100,"_column_size":100},"elements":[{"origin":"vc_column_text","id":"0ad9bfe","elType":"widget","settings":{"content":"The primary goal of this quick start guide is to introduce you to Unreal Engine 4`s (UE4) development environment. By the end of this guide, you`ll know how to set up and develop C++ Projects in UE4. This guide shows you how to create a new Unreal Engine project, add a new C++ class to it, compile the project, and add an instance of a new class to your level. By the time you reach the end of this guide, you`ll be able to see your programmed Actor floating above a table in the level. This quick start guide shows you how to add assets to your Unreal Engine (UE4) games. By the end of this guide, you`ll know how to use the Project Browser to create new projects and navigate the Content Browser to find and add content. You`ll also know where to find information on the FBX Content Pipeline while learning how to use the Material Editor to modify Materials before applying them to a Static Mesh Actor.

Main Features

By the time you reach the end of this guide, you`ll be able to see your programmed Actor floating above a table in the level. This quick start guide shows you how to add assets to your Unreal Engine (UE4) games. By the end of this guide, you`ll know how to use the Project Browser to create new projects and navigate the Content Browser to find and add content. You`ll also know where to find information on the FBX Content Pipeline while learning how to use the Material Editor to modify Materials before applying them to a Static Mesh Actor.

item.excerpt:encoded: With no prior experience, you will have the opportunity to walk through hands-on examples with Hadoop and Spark frameworks, two of the most common in the industry. You will be comfortable explaining the specific components and basic processes of the Hadoop architecture, software stack, and execution environment. In the assignments you will be guided in how data scientists apply the important concepts and techniques such as Map-Reduce that are used to solve fundamental problems in big data. You`ll feel empowered to have conversations about big data and the data analysis process.

By the time you reach the end of this guide, you`ll be able to see your programmed Actor floating above a table in the level. This quick start guide shows you how to add assets to your Unreal Engine (UE4) games. By the end of this guide, you`ll know how to use the Project Browser to create new projects and navigate the Content Browser to find and add content. You`ll also know where to find information on the FBX Content Pipeline while learning how to use the Material Editor to modify Materials before applying them to a Static Mesh Actor.

Main Features

  • You might be thinking, all of the above - and that is fine. But as a complete beginner learning Unreal Engine 4.
  • The rendering system in Unreal Engine 4 is an all-new, DirectX 11 pipeline that includes deferred shading.
Learning a new game engine as a complete beginner is very intimidating. There are a lot of tutorials, documentation and advice already out but how do you start and proceed with learning Unreal Engine 4 is unclear. You get pulled into many different directions and end up confused and overwhelmed. I have spent a lot of time deconstructing what it takes to learn a game engine from scratch. What it is that you should focus on first and what you should avoid until later.","editor":"

  • The rendering system in Unreal Engine 4 is an all-new, DirectX 11 pipeline that includes deferred shading.
Learning a new game engine as a complete beginner is very intimidating. There are a lot of tutorials, documentation and advice already out but how do you start and proceed with learning Unreal Engine 4 is unclear. You get pulled into many different directions and end up confused and overwhelmed. I have spent a lot of time deconstructing what it takes to learn a game engine from scratch. What it is that you should focus on first and what you should avoid until later."},"widgetType":"text-editor","elements":null}]}],"widgetType":"section"}]

item.title: Real Things Art Painting by Jason Ni
item.dc:creator: admin
item.excerpt:encoded: With no prior experience, you will have the opportunity to walk through hands-on examples with Hadoop and Spark frameworks, two of the most common in the industry. You will be comfortable explaining the specific components and basic processes of the Hadoop architecture, software stack, and execution environment. In the assignments you will be guided in how data scientists apply the important concepts and techniques such as Map-Reduce that are used to solve fundamental problems in big data. You`ll feel empowered to have conversations about big data and the data analysis process.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
Productivity Hacks to Get More Done in 2018

28 February 2017

  1. Facebook News Feed Eradicator (free chrome extension) Stay focused by removing your Facebook newsfeed and replacing it with an inspirational quote. Disable the tool anytime you want to see what friends are up to!
  2. Hide My Inbox (free chrome extension for Gmail) Stay focused by hiding your inbox. Click "show your inbox" at a scheduled time and batch processs everything one go.
  3. Habitica (free mobile + web app) Gamify your to do list. Treat your life like a game and earn gold goins for getting stuff done!

item.title: Design Instruments for Communication
item.dc:creator: admin
item.excerpt:encoded: With no prior experience, you will have the opportunity to walk through hands-on examples with Hadoop and Spark frameworks, two of the most common in the industry. You will be comfortable explaining the specific components and basic processes of the Hadoop architecture, software stack, and execution environment. In the assignments you will be guided in how data scientists apply the important concepts and techniques such as Map-Reduce that are used to solve fundamental problems in big data. You`ll feel empowered to have conversations about big data and the data analysis process.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
Productivity Hacks to Get More Done in 2018

28 February 2017

  1. Facebook News Feed Eradicator (free chrome extension) Stay focused by removing your Facebook newsfeed and replacing it with an inspirational quote. Disable the tool anytime you want to see what friends are up to!
  2. Hide My Inbox (free chrome extension for Gmail) Stay focused by hiding your inbox. Click "show your inbox" at a scheduled time and batch processs everything one go.
  3. Habitica (free mobile + web app) Gamify your to do list. Treat your life like a game and earn gold goins for getting stuff done!

[{"origin":"vc_row","id":"fd49096","elType":"section","settings":[],"elements":[{"origin":"vc_column","id":"fd494e2","elType":"column","settings":{"_inline_size_tablet":100,"_inline_size":100,"_column_size":100},"elements":[{"origin":"vc_column_text","id":"fd49812","elType":"widget","settings":{"content":"The primary goal of this quick start guide is to introduce you to Unreal Engine 4`s (UE4) development environment. By the end of this guide, you`ll know how to set up and develop C++ Projects in UE4. This guide shows you how to create a new Unreal Engine project, add a new C++ class to it, compile the project, and add an instance of a new class to your level. By the time you reach the end of this guide, you`ll be able to see your programmed Actor floating above a table in the level. This quick start guide shows you how to add assets to your Unreal Engine (UE4) games. By the end of this guide, you`ll know how to use the Project Browser to create new projects and navigate the Content Browser to find and add content. You`ll also know where to find information on the FBX Content Pipeline while learning how to use the Material Editor to modify Materials before applying them to a Static Mesh Actor.

Main Features

  • You might be thinking, all of the above - and that is fine. But as a complete beginner learning Unreal Engine 4.
  • The rendering system in Unreal Engine 4 is an all-new, DirectX 11 pipeline that includes deferred shading.
Learning a new game engine as a complete beginner is very intimidating. There are a lot of tutorials, documentation and advice already out but how do you start and proceed with learning Unreal Engine 4 is unclear. You get pulled into many different directions and end up confused and overwhelmed. I have spent a lot of time deconstructing what it takes to learn a game engine from scratch. What it is that you should focus on first and what you should avoid until later.","editor":"
  • You might be thinking, all of the above - and that is fine. But as a complete beginner learning Unreal Engine 4.
  • The rendering system in Unreal Engine 4 is an all-new, DirectX 11 pipeline that includes deferred shading.
Learning a new game engine as a complete beginner is very intimidating. There are a lot of tutorials, documentation and advice already out but how do you start and proceed with learning Unreal Engine 4 is unclear. You get pulled into many different directions and end up confused and overwhelmed. I have spent a lot of time deconstructing what it takes to learn a game engine from scratch. What it is that you should focus on first and what you should avoid until later."},"widgetType":"text-editor","elements":null}]}],"widgetType":"section"}]

item.title: Basics of Masterstudy
item.dc:creator: admin
item.excerpt:encoded: With no prior experience, you will have the opportunity to walk through hands-on examples with Hadoop and Spark frameworks, two of the most common in the industry. You will be comfortable explaining the specific components and basic processes of the Hadoop architecture, software stack, and execution environment. In the assignments you will be guided in how data scientists apply the important concepts and techniques such as Map-Reduce that are used to solve fundamental problems in big data. You`ll feel empowered to have conversations about big data and the data analysis process.

The system includes a powerful admin panel and course builder, messaging system, advanced quiz options, integrates with the most helpful tools and much more. The WordPress plugin is a part of the Masterstudy WordPress theme for the education business. Upgrading to the theme is optional but does come with additional benefits and functions, and create a perfect match with the plugin.","editor":"The plugin is a full package of innovative features. The system includes a powerful admin panel and course builder, messaging system, advanced quiz options, integrates with the most helpful tools and much more. The WordPress plugin is a part of the Masterstudy WordPress theme for the education business. Upgrading to the theme is optional but does come with additional benefits and functions, and create a perfect match with the plugin."},"widgetType":"text-editor","elements":null},{"origin":"vc_single_image","id":"fbe26a3","elType":"widget","settings":{"image":"4277","img_size":"full","content":""},"widgetType":"image"},{"origin":"vc_column_text","id":"fbe3487","elType":"widget","settings":{"content":"The Masterstudy LMS is a free plugin but there is a paid PRO version as well. PRO version has everything from the free plugin plus a bunch of premium addons extending the functionality in many ways. Among those features are gamification tools like points reward system, trial and group courses, assignments and lesson live streaming. You can learn more about the premium features in the next lessons of the course. Masterstudy LMS plugin was designed for everyone. It literally covers every need in the niche of the education business. Whenever it comes to individual instructors, language or coaching centers, universities, and eLearning platforms — the Masterstudy learning management system will meet the challenge. To make sure, keep watching the lessons and we’ll show how to work with plugin fast and easy.","editor":"The Masterstudy LMS is a free plugin but there is a paid PRO version as well. PRO version has everything from the free plugin plus a bunch of premium addons extending the functionality in many ways. Among those features are gamification tools like points reward system, trial and group courses, assignments and lesson live streaming. You can learn more about the premium features in the next lessons of the course. Masterstudy LMS plugin was designed for everyone. It literally covers every need in the niche of the education business. Whenever it comes to individual instructors, language or coaching centers, universities, and eLearning platforms — the Masterstudy learning management system will meet the challenge. To make sure, keep watching the lessons and we’ll show how to work with plugin fast and easy."},"widgetType":"text-editor","elements":null},{"origin":"vc_column_text","id":"fbe37c2","elType":"widget","settings":{"content":"

You will be comfortable explaining the specific components and basic processes of the Hadoop architecture, software stack, and execution environment. In the assignments you will be guided in how data scientists apply the important concepts and techniques such as Map-Reduce that are used to solve fundamental problems in big data. You`ll feel empowered to have conversations about big data and the data analysis process.

You'll feel empowered to have conversations about big data and the data analysis process.

28 February 2017

  1. Facebook News Feed Eradicator (free chrome extension) Stay focused by removing your Facebook newsfeed and replacing it with an inspirational quote. Disable the tool anytime you want to see what friends are up to!
  2. Hide My Inbox (free chrome extension for Gmail) Stay focused by hiding your inbox. Click "show your inbox" at a scheduled time and batch processs everything one go.
  3. Habitica (free mobile + web app) Gamify your to do list. Treat your life like a game and earn gold goins for getting stuff done!

  • You might be thinking, all of the above - and that is fine. But as a complete beginner learning Unreal Engine 4.
  • The rendering system in Unreal Engine 4 is an all-new, DirectX 11 pipeline that includes deferred shading.
Learning a new game engine as a complete beginner is very intimidating. There are a lot of tutorials, documentation and advice already out but how do you start and proceed with learning Unreal Engine 4 is unclear. You get pulled into many different directions and end up confused and overwhelmed. I have spent a lot of time deconstructing what it takes to learn a game engine from scratch. What it is that you should focus on first and what you should avoid until later.","editor":"

item.title: Engine Target Audience
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Two fourth grade classes are learning about the California Gold Rush and the migration that ensued. In one class, the teacher has difficulty maintaining students interest, and there is much chatter and note passing. In the other class, students are out of their seats, actively engaged, and retaining information (as witnessed on test scores). Both teachers have the same material and are following the same standards. Then why is there such a difference? In the first class, the teacher uses their expertise to attempt to convey material to students. She has not thoroughly planned her lesson, because she knows this material well. As a result, she often uses vague terms and students have difficulty relating concepts. In the other class, however, the teacher has spent much time creating a lesson where students role-play various characters in history. They are thinking about who, what, where, when and why these events happened. As a result, they are engaged and taking part of their learning. The teacher is clear, and there are few to no management issues. The idea of clear objectives refers to the creation of success-based activities that are focused on objectives and provide the teacher with clear guidelines. One basic rule of thumb for this is ABCD objectives. A-audience, B-behavior, C-condition, D-degree. In other words, target lesson objectives to a specific people, doing a specific thing, under certain circumstances a number of times correctly. Similarly, teacher clarity is an essential skill. Avoid vague terms such as approximations like almost, ambiguous designations like somehow, bluffing like everyone knows, indeterminate quantification such as a lot or a few, and probability like generally and often . Also avoid rabbit trails or mazes. They lead to misbehavior from confusion. Withitness and overlapping refer to the teachers ability to multitask, keeping students working and interpreting their body language. Lesson momentum keeps the lesson on target by preventing fragmented instruction (using too many steps) and over-dwelling on concepts. Lesson smoothness maintains a steady rhythm in teaching the lesson, as well as speeding up or slowing down as needed based on students body language. This includes connected discourse, or the linking of parts in the lesson through clear objectives, and creative repetition, which is the review of points in a creative and new way. Finally, group focus keeps students on task by providing variety, keeping students accountable and having them involved. (Savage, 1999).

Spreadsheet sample

Individualization: 2345 275478 507475
Integral Components: 83835 754754 94757575
Demonstration: 2378 754278 507575
Significance: 2788 879699 947575

item.title: Ray Tracing
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
As most of us learned in high school physics, ray tracing is an idea that has been around for centuries. Global illumination in computer graphics has a somewhat shorter history. Early computer graphics shading models proposed by Henri Gouraud and Bui Tuong Phong, among others, computed reflections based on the spatial relationship between light sources and a point on a surface. Somewhat later, Jim Blinn developed a reflection model derived from Ken Torrances work describing inter-reflections of the microscopic structures of surfaces. (That model was later expanded by Rob Cook and Ken Torrance himself into the widely used Cook-Torrance shading model.) Shortly thereafter, Blinn and Martin Newell published a paper describing environment mapping, which replaced light sources with a 360-degree texture map of the surrounding environment. It was this development of environment mapping that caught my attention. The rendering of a shiny teapot with doors and windows reflected from its surface yielded a level of realism that I had never imagined for computer-generated imagery. I stared at the image for hours and wondered how one could ever improve it. Environment mapping did have one huge limitation of not being able to accurately render reflections of objects close to the object being rendered. An image from Turner Whitteds 1979 SIGGRAPH paper featured a structure resembling the Bell Labs building in Holmdel, New Jersey, where Whitteds work was done. Clearly the effects of Phongs model are local and Torrances model and its derivatives are microscopic in scale. It seemed natural to label Blinn and Newells model as global in scope. Hence the term global illumination. The question then became how to implement it without the limitations of the environment map?

Why Ray Tracing Is a Natural Choice for Global Illumination?

  • Add ray tracing features to an existing DirectX 12 sample application.
  • This step-by-step guide walks you through the major building blocks.
  • The guide also includes extensive code snippets you can drop into.
  • Learn how to set up your Windows development environment to.
Because ray tracing is so incredibly simple, it should have been an obvious choice for implementing global illumination in computer graphics. Ray casting for image generation had been pioneered by Arthur Appel, at IBM, and commercialized by Robert Goldstein and associates, at MAGI. MAGI had originally utilized multi-bounce ray tracing to track radiation within tanks. In my own early career, I had been involved with ocean acoustics and remembered a diagram of ray-traced sound being refracted through varying depths of the ocean and reflected from the surface. Eventually a memory of that diagram popped into my head and it then became clear to me how to improve upon the global illumination method that Blinn and Newell had initiated. My own hesitation about using ray tracing was simply concern about performance. There has always been a bit of a divide between computer graphics for real-time interaction and graphics for film. General Electrics lunar landing simulator obviously had to run in real time to train astronauts. This constraint continued with David Evans and Ivan Sutherlands flight simulators as well as neighboring research at the University of Utah. Henri Gourauds smooth shading ran in real time at essentially no cost. A little known chapter in Bui Tuong Phongs dissertation includes a description of circuitry for real-time shading even though most implementations of Phong shading did not run in real time. The availability of frame buffers changed the computer graphics landscape dramatically. Rather than attempting to render images at the refresh rate of CRTs, it became possible to render at any speed and view a static image on the screen. Ed Catmulls subdivision algorithm coupled to a z-buffer could render arbitrarily complex curved surfaces into a frame memory in a matter of minutes rather than milliseconds. Blinn and Newells environment mapping required tens of minutes per frame. This trend toward higher realism at slower rates gave me the courage to try something even slower.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
Early computer graphics shading models proposed by Henri Gouraud and Bui Tuong Phong, among others, computed reflections based on the spatial relationship between light sources and a point on a surface. Somewhat later, Jim Blinn developed a reflection model derived from Ken Torrances work describing inter-reflections of the microscopic structures of surfaces.

The rendering of a shiny teapot with doors and windows reflected from its surface

item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]Masterstudy LMS theme and plugin open unlimited opportunities for their users.Extended functionality, simplicity, and accuracy provide customers an enjoyable experience. Both products were developed in a way they could ensure a convenient use equally for admins, instructors, and students. Lets find out what Masterstudy prepared for you.[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image="4153" img_size="full"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]After you spend a minute installing the theme, LMS plugin and other related tools, you can open the dashboard panel and look through the settings. We guarantee, you will start to navigate easily from the first seconds. In this part you can set up some general settings, adjust the course page appearance, edit the permalinks, enable payment methods. We should mention that you can use not only offline payments but the instant online payment gateways like Stripe and Paypal.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_single_image image="4155" img_size="full"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]On this page you will be able to customize your own certificates. No need to use bored samples. Create original templates and impress your students. Dont forget to set up URLs and profiles.Also, there is the tab where all of the addons are situated. So you can access them from here and enable whatever you need.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Course & Lesson Creation
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]Lets see how easy it is to build a course with Masterstudy. It can literally take up to 30 minutes. We prepared a short guide for you with highlights and steps sequence.Go to the Courses submenu and on the new screen click on the button Add new.Now you have all sections and settings to adjust on one page. Just on one screen, there are plenty of options. Enter the title for your course, Select a category, Add a featured image[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image="4170" img_size="full"][vc_column_text]In the Course Settings:
  • Mark course as featured;
  • Specify the level and duration;
  • Enable course retaking.
[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image="4102" img_size="full"][vc_column_text]Under the Accessibility tab:
  • Set the price
  • Exclude from membership
  • Mark it as affiliate course
[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image="4100" img_size="full"][vc_column_text]Under the Announcement tab:
  • Enter the announcement content
[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image="4101" img_size="full"][vc_column_text]Under the FAQ tab:
  • Add new FAQ items
[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image="4103" img_size="full"][vc_column_text]All the courses can be divided into sections. Each section can contain any amount of questions and quizzes. Simply add new sections by entering a title and clicking on the Plus icon. You can add lessons and quizzes using the same scheme. Check further lessons to find out more. Use the drag and drop tool to move elements and organize a clear order. If there are several instructors using the website, they also can build courses via the frontend course builder. Lets see how it looks.[/vc_column_text][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][vc_column_text]The interface is very simple, the builder has almost the same options as one in the backend. So instructors have the power to set up courses without any limitations.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text="Lessons"][vc_column_text]Lets dive deeper. We just said that you can divide each course into sections and add lessons to these categories. Building Lessons also gives you freedom to unleash your creativity. First, lets see how quick it is to add a new lesson. In the curriculum section enter a title in a box provided and click on the Plus button. Now you can spend more time setting it up.[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image="4104" img_size="full"][vc_column_text]In Masterstudy we have three types of lessons. These are text, video and slide. Depending on the styles you can divide your content and learning materials into segments and apply needed formats. At your disposal are the following settings:
  • Video poster
  • Preview options
  • Duration specification
  • Front End description
  • Content options
[/vc_column_text][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][vc_column_text]Add any media files to the lesson so your students could get the quality and interactive learning material. Upload images, videos and slides and find an approach to every student.Write a description and add lesson content, set featured image and specify the duration.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

"},"widgetType":"text-editor","elements":null},"9":{"origin":"vc_single_image","id":"f7b9ab0","elType":"widget","settings":{"image":"4103","img_size":"full","content":""},"widgetType":"image"},"10":{"origin":"vc_column_text","id":"f7ba39f","elType":"widget","settings":{"content":"All the courses can be divided into sections. Each section can contain any amount of questions and quizzes. Simply add new sections by entering a title and clicking on the Plus icon. You can add lessons and quizzes using the same scheme. Check further lessons to find out more. Use the drag and drop tool to move elements and organize a clear order. If there are several instructors using the website, they also can build courses via the frontend course builder. Let’s see how it looks.","editor":"All the courses can be divided into sections. Each section can contain any amount of questions and quizzes. Simply add new sections by entering a title and clicking on the Plus icon. You can add lessons and quizzes using the same scheme. Check further lessons to find out more. Use the drag and drop tool to move elements and organize a clear order. If there are several instructors using the website, they also can build courses via the frontend course builder. Let’s see how it looks."},"widgetType":"text-editor","elements":null},"12":{"origin":"vc_column_text","id":"f7ba6b3","elType":"widget","settings":{"content":"The interface is very simple, the builder has almost the same options as one in the backend. So instructors have the power to set up courses without any limitations.","editor":"The interface is very simple, the builder has almost the same options as one in the backend. So instructors have the power to set up courses without any limitations."},"widgetType":"text-editor","elements":null},"13":{"origin":"vc_custom_heading","id":"f7ba82f","elType":"widget","settings":{"text":"Lessons","content":"","stm_title_font_weight":"700"},"widgetType":"vc_custom_heading"},"14":{"origin":"vc_column_text","id":"f7bb078","elType":"widget","settings":{"content":"Let’s dive deeper. We just said that you can divide each course into sections and add lessons to these categories. Building Lessons also gives you freedom to unleash your creativity. First, let’s see how quick it is to add a new lesson. In the curriculum section enter a title in a box provided and click on the Plus button. Now you can spend more time setting it up.","editor":"Let’s dive deeper. We just said that you can divide each course into sections and add lessons to these categories. Building Lessons also gives you freedom to unleash your creativity. First, let’s see how quick it is to add a new lesson. In the curriculum section enter a title in a box provided and click on the Plus button. Now you can spend more time setting it up."},"widgetType":"text-editor","elements":null},"15":{"origin":"vc_single_image","id":"f7bb2df","elType":"widget","settings":{"image":"4104","img_size":"full","content":""},"widgetType":"image"},"16":{"origin":"vc_column_text","id":"f7bbcdc","elType":"widget","settings":{"content":"In Masterstudy we have three types of lessons. These are text, video and slide. Depending on the styles you can divide your content and learning materials into segments and apply needed formats. At your disposal are the following settings:
  • Video poster
  • Preview options
  • Duration specification
  • Front End description
  • Content options
","editor":"In Masterstudy we have three types of lessons. These are text, video and slide. Depending on the styles you can divide your content and learning materials into segments and apply needed formats. At your disposal are the following settings:
  • Video poster
  • Preview options
  • Duration specification
  • Front End description
  • Content options
"},"widgetType":"text-editor","elements":null},"18":{"origin":"vc_column_text","id":"f7bc025","elType":"widget","settings":{"content":"Add any media files to the lesson so your students could get the quality and interactive learning material. Upload images, videos and slides and find an approach to every student. Write a description and add lesson content, set featured image and specify the duration.","editor":"Add any media files to the lesson so your students could get the quality and interactive learning material. Upload images, videos and slides and find an approach to every student. Write a description and add lesson content, set featured image and specify the duration."},"widgetType":"text-editor","elements":null}}}],"widgetType":"section"}]

item.title: Quizzing
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]Now, when you know how to add lessons to the course we can move to a more difficult part and construct the quiz. One of the main advantages of Masterstudy LMS plugin is advanced quizzing options. No more boring typical questioned tasks that only ruins the experience. By using the proper software you can build engaging, interesting quizzes with a variety of question types.[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][vc_single_image image="4239" img_size="full"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][vc_single_image image="4240" img_size="full"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][vc_single_image image="4241" img_size="full"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][vc_single_image image="4242" img_size="full"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text]To add a new quiz, enter its title in the course curriculum section and click on the Plus button. Use the pencil icon to open a new screen of quiz editing options.On this page you can:
  • Add a description and content
  • Set featured image
  • Specify the duration
  • Enable display of correct answers
  • Enable question randomizer
  • Set passing grade
  • Indicate points total cut after retake
[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image="4108" img_size="full"][vc_column_text]The main thing that is left is the questions list. Right under the content field there is a section where you can add new questions. Two simple steps are needed to create your first question. The first one: enter the title. The second one: click on Add new question.[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image="4109" img_size="full"][vc_column_text]The next time you will be creating quizzes you can use the search box to select a question from those youve already added. After you have entered a new question, use the pencil icon to open its settings on the separate screen or click on the plus icon to expand the widow on the same page. The first thing we need to mention, there are 6 types of questions available:
  • Single choice
  • Multi choice
  • True or false
  • Item match
  • Keywords
  • Fill the gap
[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image="4111" img_size="full"][vc_column_text]Plus, the Question bank, which is not the type itself but a helpful option to create categories and divide questions into them. While you will be changing the types, settings will be changing respectively. For example, you chose the True or False form of question, so you only need to select which one of two options is correct for the answer. But if you picked Item Match, you need to write several items and matches for them. Besides, you will have an additional option to write the explanation for the correct answer which will be shown in results. As you can see, each type has its own set of options to adjust. Despite the availability of different options, the interface is built intuitively and its very easy to navigate even if you are using the plugin for the first time.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Modern UI
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="4244" img_size="full"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1582183076369{padding-top: 30px !important;}"][vc_column_text]Modern and useful interface is vital when it comes to website building. We tried to simplify the work for you as much as we could. Among the things to highlight there are course ratings and course wishlists.
Users of the website can add courses they like to the wishlist by a single click and save the option for later purchase.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]After the course completion learners may leave a review and rate the course. Rating system allows students to share their impressions and help others to evaluate the content.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Management
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]The pro version of LMS plugin is included in Masterstudy Theme. It contains a big number of premium features. We constantly work on the new updates and addons and you get all of them if you already purchased the theme. What is more you have a freedom to activate and use only those you need the most. Each addon has its own pack of setups just to make your work much easier.Lets look through the several addons which help you to manage the operating processes.[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image="4120" img_size="full" alignment="center"][vc_separator][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1582108329279{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}"]Prerequisites allow establishing the requirements for taking the course. Only eligible users will be able to enroll and study. In other words students will face several prerequisites to accomplish before taking the course. How exactly you can use this tool. Choose the course as prerequisite and specify the passing percent. In that case, students will be required to complete this course with a particular grade, for example, 75%, to be eligible for taking the next course.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1582029714184{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_single_image image="4121" img_size="328x273" alignment="center"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_separator][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]Drip Content allows you to release lessons over time, instead of giving learners immediate access. You can lock lessons in sequential order or set your own sequence. Depending on this, students will get access to the 2nd lesson after completing the first one.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="4122" img_size="328x273" alignment="center"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_separator][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]Co-instructor is another interesting option that will help you manage the website work. With this option you can assign one more teacher to the course. Thus, one course will be led by two instructors. Take the chance to get extra help, a workmate to share responsibilities and provide students with more interaction.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="4130" img_size="328x273" alignment="center"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_separator][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]Gradeebook Addon. What a learning activity without grading! We are used to getting marks. In our plugin we provide such services. Instructors can grade students and all their statistics are available in the Gradebook Addon. By using it you can easily manage the students performance, monitor their progress, check students status and courses/quizzes statistics.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="4131" img_size="328x273" alignment="center"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_separator][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]Live Stream. To increase the engaging rate try to adapt to live streaming. The feature is developed to improve the interaction between students and teachers. It has many useful options: Q&A sections, live chat and commenting. While still participating in the lesson, students can ask questions and get detailed answers from a teacher in real-time. Use platforms like YouTube to broadcast streamings.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="4145" img_size="328x273" alignment="center"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_separator][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]Online Testing Addon. In addition to this, there is an Online Testing feature. By using Online Testing you can paste any quizzes through the shortcode to any page[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="4133" img_size="328x273" alignment="center"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_separator][/vc_column][/vc_row]

Take the chance to get extra help, a workmate to share responsibilities and provide students with more interaction."},"widgetType":"text-editor","elements":null}]},{"origin":"vc_column_inner","id":"f3b7e28","elType":"column","settings":{"width":"1/2","_inline_size_tablet":50,"_inline_size":50,"_column_size":50},"elements":[{"origin":"vc_single_image","id":"f3b81f4","elType":"widget","settings":{"image":"4130","img_size":"328x273","alignment":"center","content":""},"widgetType":"image"}]}]},{"origin":"vc_separator","id":"f3b8c46","elType":"widget","settings":{"content":"","color":"#dddddd"},"widgetType":"divider"},{"origin":"vc_row_inner","id":"f3b8efc","elType":"section","settings":[],"elements":[{"origin":"vc_column_inner","id":"f3b9356","elType":"column","settings":{"width":"1/2","_inline_size_tablet":50,"_inline_size":50,"_column_size":50},"elements":[{"origin":"vc_column_text","id":"f3b9680","elType":"widget","settings":{"content":"Gradeebook Addon. item.title: Marketing Tools
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]Online courses website built with Masterstudy doesnt limit you just with one option of selling individual courses to individuals.You can follow the best marketing practices and sell courses in packages or for groups of people.[/vc_column_text][vc_separator][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="4140" img_size="328x273"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="2/3"][vc_column_text]Course Bundles also work as a good marketing tool. By packing courses into bundle you provide a higher value offer to your students and increase your revenue. Enable these options from the Addons page and make some setup. For groups you can specify the number of members allowed in one group and set the price. Easily create new groups by adding users IDs or import the csv file. In bundles settings you are allowed to set the limits for bundles quantity and for number of courses per package. Easily manage these options right from the front-end builder. [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_separator][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="4141" img_size="328x273"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="2/3"][vc_column_text]Trial Courses. This option offers learners free first lesson of the course. It is a perfect option to interest your students before the purchase. By offering them a free trial lesson you can remove all the doubts. Set the number of free lessons and make them open to the public in the Trial Course Settings.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_separator][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="4139" img_size="328x273"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="2/3"][vc_column_text]Group courses are the best choice for you if you want to expand your target audience. Sell courses to organizations and groups of people. This is a chance to collaborate with a new business segment.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Engagement & Gamification
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]Before creating Masterstudy, we did thorough research and found out that more often education products lack good content and have low engagement rate. Because of this reason we decided to add more options which allow you to diversify your content. This includes different lesson types (see lesson 2 for more details), question types (see lesson 3), ability to use media files of various formats and several addons we will be describing in the lesson. [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_separator][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]Statistics & Payout Addon. Control your site finances with an accurate Financial System. It is a strong management of sales with the statistics data and the ability to set auto payouts with cron and award your contributors.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_separator][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]Points System. Another method to interest students is to enable the Points System. This function allows to reward learners with points for different kinds of activities on the website. Once they gain a needed amount of points, they can redeem points for courses. You just need to identify the number of points that will be equal to $1.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_separator][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]Assignment. One more option that boost learning activity is Assignment. It includes two types of tasks you can ask learners to complete. These are essays and uploads, where students can attach files required. Regulate the number of attachments and maximum size of files to upload. Specify it in the Assignments settings. You can add assignments right from the course Curriculum or from the Assignment menu.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_separator][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]Messaging and Announcement System. Use a simple interface, make announcements and use a messaging system to keep students informed. Let them enjoy maximum care and assistance through a private messaging system and an internal social network. User-friendly messaging and announcements system will help your students and lecturers share their knowledge and keep in touch with each other.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Udemy Affiliate
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]You probably heard about Udemy, a giant platform for online courses. Its hard to imagine the number of courses that exist there. You have an opportunity to become a Udemy affiliate and import courses from the platform to your site. Just use our Udemy Importer addon and import courses by few clicks. For correct work you will Udemy API credentials.

Then sell courses and get commissions from affiliates[/vc_column_text][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Review on Basics of Masterstudy by posonty
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: The best Theme, without a doubt, to create course. The best of all, is that in the latest versions is already fully compatible with the GDPR registration, something that not all themes like that have. I recommend it 100%, especially if you live in Europe or have students from Europe. The customer service by the developer is perfect.

item.title: Review on Basics of Masterstudy by Stylemix Themes
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: The Design Quality of this theme is top notch, theme is very intuitive and full of options and gave me exactly what i wanted, i needed a udemy like website, and this theme gave me exactly what i wanted. Apart from the design, the theme is very customizable and code quality is very clean too.

item.title: Investing for Your Future
item.dc:creator: admin
item.excerpt:encoded: It is no exaggeration to say this MasterStudy experience was transformativeboth professionally and personally. This workshop will long remain a high point of my life. Thanks again. I am feeling energized and eager to start teaching my class next week. I cant wait to use all of my new teaching tools. I will absolutely recommend this workshop to other educators!

item.title: Paints of the Future
item.dc:creator: admin
item.excerpt:encoded: The response to your MasterStudy has been really overwhelming! Those who participated in the workshop are spreading the word here on campus and the buzz is on. The VP of Instruction wants you to come back! Her goal is to have more faculty trained. She also wants to attend a workshop herself. Our President told me Masterstudy needs to be the cornerstone of our success program.

item.title: Come as you are
item.dc:creator: admin
item.excerpt:encoded: MasterStudy used is an excellent workshop whether you come as a counselor, advisor, administrator, or faculty member. I am going home empowered. I am looking forward to attending the On Course MasterStudy and the MasterStudy National Conference next year and facilitating the use of this excellent retention/student success course at my college.

item.title: Paints of the Future
item.dc:creator: admin
item.excerpt:encoded: It is no exaggeration to say this MasterStudy experience was transformativeboth professionally and personally. This workshop will long remain a high point of my life. Thanks again. I am feeling energized and eager to start teaching my class next week. I cant wait to use all of my new teaching tools. I will absolutely recommend this workshop to other educators!

item.title: Come as you are
item.dc:creator: admin
item.excerpt:encoded: MasterStudy used is an excellent workshop whether you come as a counselor, advisor, administrator, or faculty member. I am going home empowered. I am looking forward to attending the On Course MasterStudy and the MasterStudy National Conference next year and facilitating the use of this excellent retention/student success course at my college.
